title: Sammy J & Randy in Ricketts Lane
resume:
Sammy J is an obsessive, socially inept and altogether hopeless junior lawyer scrambling to hold onto his last ounce of dignity while clinging to the bottom rung of the corporate ladder.  Meanwhile, his slovenly housemate Randy has seen the world from all angles.  He's an opinionated, unemployed opportunist, desperately trying to win back the affections of his glamorous ex-wife... and he's a purple puppet.
While they’re loyal, eccentric and prone to burst into hilarious song at any given moment, tensions between the man and puppet will soon rise.
